content.html: do people not read the science? do they just not know anyone with long COVID? many of us work with our brains. even if you accept the risk, do you have a backup plan for if long COVID doesn't allow you to work anymore? have you threat modeled this out? what are you going to do?
content.value:
do people not read the science? do they just not know anyone with long COVID?

many of us work with our brains. even if you accept the risk, do you have a backup plan for if long COVID doesn't allow you to work anymore? have you threat modeled this out? what are you going to do?
